The image was shared on multiple social: including Uttar Pradesh Congress, Youth Congress, Delhi Youth Congress, and Daman and Diu Congress Sevadal.
UP MLA Aradhana Misra: Mona also posted the image with the same claim, urging Prime Minister Modi to take inspiration from Indira Gandhi.
Alt News performed a reverse image searc: with the caption stating that it was Indira Gandhi addressing jawans in Leh.
The Extensible Metadata Platform: XMP) tab under 'Properties' of the photo revealed that it was added on October 30, 2009, and described as a rare picture of Indira Gandhi addressing jawans in Leh in 1971.
